thumb.title: What do you think about the trailer I prepared?
thumb.description: What do you think about the trailer I prepared? I want to get your feedback (a video game trailer on Steam)Hey #gamedevs! It's #TrailerTuesday!https://store.steampowered.com/app/3690550/OHAYO_GIANTHOOK_Monster_Fishing_Adventure/?l=finnish#gaming #gamedev #indiegames #game #steam #devblog #games #trailer #tuesdayvibe #TuesdayFeeling
